Title: Establishes Three King's day as a school holiday
Summary: Establishes Three King's day as a school holiday for all public schools in a city school district of a city having a population of one million or more inhabitants.
LawCode: Add ยง3204-a, amd ยง3604, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing Three King's day as a school holiday
